DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the 12-week study is to determine if competing a physical activity program with a buddy helps increase daily physical activity when compared to completing the same physical activity program without a buddy.
DOC.criteria: 1. Physically inactive, 2. having at least one child aged less than 5 years, 3. having at least one family member or friend who can support physical activity engagement and reside in the same community, 4. having access to computer and phone, and 5. overweight/obese (Body Mass Index: 23 kg/m2 or more) 1. Having known medical conditions that prevent regular physical activity and 2. current participation in other lifestyle modification programs
